title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB 
and 31AD) (Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (sections 31ab 31ad) (covid-19) (operation certain indoor premises) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) (Covid-19)
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) (Covid-19) 
(Operation of certain indoor premises) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 385 of 2021) 
are amended, in Regulation 1, by the substitution, in paragraph (2), of “9th day 
of October 2021” for “1st day of September 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 September, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [447] 3

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) 
(Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
385 of 2021) to provide that the Regulations remain in operation until 9 
October 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [447]
